title: Deborah Birx and Anthony Fauci to Discuss Coronavirus Response
sub_head: Top U.S. health officials to be interviewed at WSJ CEO Council event
body:
Top U.S. coronavirus officials Deborah Birx and Anthony Fauci are set to be interviewed at The Wall Street Journal CEO Council summit on Tuesday, with a focus on how the U.S. plans to address rising caseloads and hospitalizations as well as the vaccine rollout.
Dr. Birx, the White House coronavirus response coordinator, will be interviewed first, followed by Dr. Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases.
In recent weeks, the strain on America’s health-care system from the latest Covid-19 surge has continued to intensify, as hospitalizations set yet another record and the number of coronavirus patients in intensive care rose above 20,000 for the first time.
President-elect Joe Biden has said he would ask Americans to wear masks for the first 100 days after he takes office, as he sets up his administration’s coronavirus response. He has asked Dr. Fauci to remain in his role and to serve as a chief medical officer in his administration and as part of his Covid-19 response team.
